name: Ensure all users have MFA configured
body: In Okta, you (administrators) can configure/enforce multi-factor authentication (MFA) at the organization level and/or at application level. This control helps you find users with no MFA at all that have access to at least one application.
remediationDescription: Depending on your security requirements, you might want to enforce MFA at the organization level requiring users to authenticate using multiple factors when accessing the Okta Dashboard, at the application level requiring users to go through MFA when accessing a certain application, or both. You can read more in the [Okta documentation](https://help.okta.com/en/prod/Content/Topics/Security/mfa/mfa-home.htm).
